title: How To Drop Shot Like Alcaraz - Essential Tennis Podcast #409
description: Carlos Alcaraz has one of the best disguised, most effective drop shots of all time and in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast I’m going to explain exactly how he does it so you can add it to your game and win more matches. You’ll learn how to effectively use the same techniques, strategies and training Alcaraz does!
author: Essential Tennis LLC
